About

Hi there, thanks for stopping by. I am currently an undergraduate at the University of California, Berkeley, where I study Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. I am also fascinated by human psychology and photography. In my free time I enjoy hiking, singing, and reading Quora.

Projects

  • Guitar Heroine: A code lab designed for students in CS61A at U.C Berkeley to practice Python lists.
  • Maplight Search: A web application built for a non profit organization as a part of the Software Engineering class at Berkeley.
  • KCC - The App: A web application designed to help my parents organize their weekly card clubs. Under construction.
